Translations.Text: Read, in the name of your Lord who created
Created the human being from a zygote
Proclaim, and your Lord is Most Bountiful
He Who taught the use of the pen
Taught the human being that which he knew not
No, but the human being transgresses all bounds
When he looks upon himself as self-sufficient
Indeed, to your Lord is the return
Do you see one who forbids
A worshipper when he turns to pray
Have you seen whether he has guidance
Do you see if he denies and turns away
Does he not know that God sees
Let him beware, that if he does not desist, We will drag him by the hair of his head
Then let him call to his advisers
We will call on the angels of punishment
No, do not follow, but bow down in adoration, and bring yourself ever closer
